summary: This simple sound mod replaces the main theme with \"Sovngarde\" from Skyrim\'s soundtrack.
descriptionHtml:
This simple sound mod replaces the main theme with \"Sovngarde\" from Skyrim\'s soundtrack.
[i]Sovngarde is the Nordic afterlife, created by Shor. Nordic warriors who have proven their mettle in battle arrive in Sovngarde after death. Fleshly pain and maladies evaporate upon entering its Hall of Valor. Spirits here enjoy mead-drinking and contests of physical prowess.[/i]

Requested by Chromone.

Cheers for Jeremy Soule, I eagerly look forward to his next game soundtrack.

==Installation==

I hardly doubt you need a tutorial if you\'ve been using mods for Skyrim before, but just in case, just drag the \"music\" folder into \"Data\" (if on XP), or just drag the whole \"Data\" folder into the root of Skyrim\'s directory and merge its contents (Vista and above)
author: jamesadalpiaz
